name: THE WILD LAND
description:
THE WILD LAND is an independent video game developed in France. In which you can go on an adventure in a wild world and develop your civilization. But unfortunately, RelouàTord, your neighbour doesn't appreciate you very much. He will send his hordes, slaughtering you if you do nothing ! 

So, are you ready to take the risk to discover the wild world of THE WILD LAND ? 

FEATURES :

- Explore a vast randomly generated world

- Build your city and develop your economy

- Resist attacks from RelouàTord

- Customize your games with the editor.

IMPORTANT NOTE:

Before download please see getting started for installation :  http://bit.ly/3Mzt2FP

THE WILD LAND is a 100% free game, but developing a game takes time, so if you want to support us, why not make a donation?

In addition, Electric Dreams may collect information that is essential to understand how our product is used. This could be for example the number of games played, an incident report... All data collected is anonymized. For more details, please see the user agreement on the official wiki.

By using our game, you agree to this agreement. 

If you have a question about THE WILD LAND, check out our wiki : http://bit.ly/3Mzt2FP

Or contact us at eletric_dreams@proton.me
